Uses of Class
model.WorldModel

  • Packages that use WorldModel 
    Package Description
    model  

    • Uses of WorldModel in model

      Methods in model with parameters of type WorldModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void Animal.move(AnimalEntity animalEntity, WorldModel model)
      Calls a movemeent strategy to set the direction of the animal entity - the actual movement is called separately and just integrates a velocity, but this sets the that direction
      abstract void Animal.resolveCollision(AnimalEntity animalEntity, WorldModel model)
      Resolve any collision the animal may have had including interactions with other animals and world edge collisions
      static void CollisionHandler.resolveCollision(AnimalEntity entity, WorldModel model, double depthLimitFromBottom, double depthLimitFromSurface)
      take entity and resolve edge collision and food change if within range of prey
      static void CollisionHandler.resolveEdgeCollisions(AnimalEntity entity, WorldModel model, double depthLimitFromBottom, double depthLimitFromSurface)
      Check if near edge, adjust direction if outside acceptable zones
      static void CollisionHandler.resolveOilCollision(AnimalEntity entity, WorldModel model, double depthLimitFromBottom, double depthLimitFromSurface)
      Strategy only used by oil - makes sure it stays in proper zone and then checks whether to attach to nearby neighbors based on their type
      void MovementStrategy.setMove(AnimalEntity animalEntity, WorldModel model)
      Different strategies implement this interface which is used to update the direction of animal based on some criteria specific to the strategy
      void BrownianMotion.setMove(AnimalEntity animalEntity, WorldModel model) 
      void AnimalEntity.takeStep(float dt, WorldModel model)
      Called by model to step forward in time
